Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
YOU THOUGHT I WAS HARD TO TOUCH BEFORE I COULD STOP TIME...: Super Senses. When Spider-Man uses it, increase the result by +1 for each time the attack was rerolled.
TIME DILATION: When making an attack roll Spider-Man may roll 3 dice instead of 2 and then, after any rerolls or die replacements, choose one die to ignore. // When Spider-Man is attacked, you may choose the opposing character rolls 3 dice instead of 2, then, after any rerolls or die replacements, choose one die to ignore.
TIME DIAMONDS: Probability Control. Spider-Man and adjacent friendly characters have SAFEGUARD: Opposing Probability Control.

February 17, 2022
rkb9190
He is the prime candidate for using the Herald dial on. Outwit is his biggest enemy, but if you take that away; he cannot be touched. Base him with an opposing big hitter and let your range attackers fire away. 10/10.
February 15, 2022
reanimationguy
If you aren’t packing outwit, you’re not taking this man down. Pulled him tonight, and he caused half a dozen crit misses across our three games. Just a brutally annoying piece.

John Tron Official
This is probably one of the coolest chases in recent sets, definitely a fun and unique character design. One thing i will say, he is very vulnerable to outwit, i i would suggest playing him with the #38 Prestige from the HOX set. All in All, he's a very solid 9/10 character
